Questions: Please let me know how old you are.
Options: 20 years & less, 21 to 30 years, 31 to 40 years, 41 to 50 years, 51 to 60 years, Above 60 years,

Questions: Do you relate with any of these symptoms?
Options: Pounding heart beat at rest, Episodes of giddiness/fainting, Breathlessness while walking, Chest Pain, None of the above,

Questions: As you are experiencing a 'pounding heartbeat' even at rest, what was your recorded heart rate?
Have you had your cholesterol level tested recently?
Did your report mention any of these abnormalities?
Options: High LDL, Low HDL, High Total Cholesterol, High Triglycerides, Cholesterol levels controlled with medication, None of the above,

Questions: Do you have high blood pressure?
Options: Yes, I have high BP, No, I've always had normal BP, I have low BP, I don't know,

Questions: Are you on medication for high blood pressure?
Do you smoke or are constantly exposed to passive smoke for the last 12 months?
Options: Yes, No, More than 1 year since I quit,

Questions: Have you smoked 100 or more cigarettes in your lifetime?

Options: Occasionally, Everyday( > 2 drinks/day), I don't drink,

Questions: Have you experienced any of the following conditions?
Options: Heart attack, Stroke, None of the above,

Questions: Has anyone in your family (parents, siblings, children) experienced the following diseases or procedures?
Options: Heart attack, Stroke, Angioplasty/ Stent placement, None of the above,

Questions: Have you ever had any of the following cardiac tests?
Options: ECG, Echocardiogram(Echo), Labs (Troponin I/Troponin T), None of the above,

Questions: Were these tests found to be normal?
Options: Yes, they were normal., No, they were abnormal.,

Questions: Which one of the following statements best describes your usual activity?
Options: 20-30mins/day high intensity, 30-40mins/day mild intensity, I workout only few days/week, I don't workout,

Questions: How many servings of red meat do you eat per month? (Eg: mutton, steak, ham, bacon, sausage, etc.)
Options: 10 or more servings, 1 to 9 servings, I don't eat red meat,
